Author: steve
Content: Indeed, and it's not that all startups do marketing that's borderline spam -- only the successful ones.

Author: paulgb
Content:
At first when I read the article, it seemed like Dude (I hadn't yet made the GK connection) was being ignorant and rude. Then after checking out the site and re-reading the article, I realized I would have asked the same questions, though not as rudely.

I wonder what Apple product he was comparing the interface to? It certainly does not look like any Apple interface I have seen (that said, I am a PC user).
